thread.title: Arsenal Manager Wenger to leave after 22 years in charge

title: Arsenal Manager Wenger to leave after 22 years in charge
text:
Arsenal Manager Wenger to leave after 22 years in charge 4:16pm BST - 01:24 
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger is to leave at the end of the season after a reign of almost 22 years that made him the most successful boss in the Premier League club's history. Julian Satterthwaite reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger is to leave at the end of the season after a reign of almost 22 years that made him the most successful boss in the Premier League club's history. Julian Satterthwaite reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qMqb0B
